message.body: Let's get dinner at mad mex!
If you are free of Course
I would love to but im kinda in the middle of something....ï¿¼
Oh my god!!!! Ahhhhh. Moss creature! That looks good.
If you wanna come over tonight for cauliflower crust pizza it's much better than it sounds. I promise.
Maybe! I know you're just across the street but even just leaving my bedroom to go downstairs is hard, haha. Are you going to Malia's?
I thought about it briefly but I'm not gunna. I'm going to go to the Michael snow thing today. That's enoughy socializing for the week. Heh
Totally. Leaving the house once is enough. What time is pizza?
Probably not til 7 or so. Pajamas are welcome.
Ha! My pjs are so gross, im sad tess and julian have to see them. Im sure the period stains make Julian uncomfortable. Ok, want me to check in at 7 and then you can tell me if its safe to come over?
Yeah sounds good. I'll be in my house coat. It's big. No period stains on it yet. Text ya later.
